item.description:
Let's help the ODWIN Learning Center get their labels on as we get acquainted with one another!
They have address labels to go on postcards for their annual fundraiser, and a hip Chris
Douglass restaurant just a block from the center. We'll head there after for apps and a cash bar. Tickets for the apre/apps party are FREE but available only at ODWIN, across the street from Ashmont Station on the red/Ashmont line. Space is limited for this one, so RSVP soon!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll greet you at the door
item.name: Volunteering and apres party
